item.title: Intro
item.description:
System?

  • Archive Goals
  • Add Value (MOST IMPORTANT!!!)

how to add hours

That’s why we need model

we need required that everybody understand clear and no confusion

data, interface, performance

and a solution focussed on solution

What is SAD?

ensure systems meets the need, somtimes customer doesn’t explained the need accurately

ensure system quality

Provided Value to organization

goals: translaes, conncts, conmmunicates

bridges the gap between the users/organisation and the technological details
